document.text:
From: 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) 
Date: Wed, 12 May 2021 22:15:01 +0000 
Attachments: 2021.05.11,_GM,_scheduling_order.pdf 
The Court has issued a scheduling order for the trial (attached). Jury selection will occur during the week of November 
15th, and the trial will begin on November 29th. 
Thanks, 
From: 
Sent: Friday, May 7, 2021 2:14 
To: 
Cc 
(USANYS) 
Subject: Re: United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) 
Everyone is all clear for November/December. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On May 7, 2021, at 1:27 PM, wrote: 
Following up on our conversation yesterday, please let us know if there are any scheduling conflicts we should be aware 
of. Our letter to the Court regarding scheduling is due on Monday. 
Thanks very much, 
From 
Sent: Thursday, May 6, 2021 12:57 PM 
To: 
Cc: Brittany Henderson 
(USANYS) 
<> 
>; 
Subject: Re: United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) 
EFTA00014664

I can talk from now until 3. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On May 6, 2021, at 12:53 PM, wrote: 
Following up on this, do you have a few minutes this afternoon or tomorrow for a few scheduling questions? We are 
working on a proposal to the Court regarding a potential trial date, but wanted to consult with you to make sure we 
weren't proposing dates when your clients were not available. 
Thanks, 
From: 
Se 
To: 
Cc: I 
 >; 
(USANYS) 
Subject: United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) 
Please see the attached order regarding the trial date in this case. We'll update you when we have more information. 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00014665
